doc:
Chris Bauer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris_Bauer 0 Mark Christopher Bauer (born October 28, 1966) is an American film, television, and theater actor. Bauer's work includes roles in 8mm, The Devil's Advocate, Face/Off, The Conspirator, and Snow White: A Tale of Terror. Bauer has also starred in television shows The Wire, Third Watch, True Blood and Survivor's Remorse. He has appeared on Broadway in A Streetcar Named Desire and has originated roles in plays by David Mamet, John Patrick Shanley, and Jez Butterworth. Mark_Christopher_Bauer ( born October_28_,_1966 ) is an_American_film , television , and theater_actor . Bauer 's_work includes roles in 8_mm , The_Devil 's_Advocate , Face/Off , The_Conspirator , and Snow_White : A_Tale of Terror . He has_appeared on Broadway in A_Streetcar Named Desire and has_originated roles in plays by David_Mamet , John_Patrick_Shanley , and Jez_Butterworth .
